mapper.select:
select ppr.RECIPE_FLOW,ppr.PATIENT_FLOW,ppr.PATIENT_CODE,ppr.PATIENT_NAME_PY,ppr.ORG_FLOW,ppr.PROJ_FLOW,ppr.RECIPE_DATE, ppr.RECIPE_DOCTOR_FLOW,ppr.RECIPE_DOCTOR_NAME,ppr.SEND_DATE,ppr.SEND_USER_FLOW,ppr.SEND_USER_NAME, pp.proj_name,pp.apply_dept_name,pa.patient_Name,pa.sex_name,pa.patient_age from pdsci.pub_proj pp,pdsci.pub_patient pa,pdsci.pub_patient_recipe ppr where ppr.proj_flow=pp.proj_flow and ppr.patient_flow=pa.patient_flow and pp.RECORD_STATUS ='Y' and pa.RECORD_STATUS ='Y' and ppr.RECORD_STATUS ='Y'
and pa.patient_name like '%${patientName}%'
and pp.proj_name like '%${projName}%'
and pa.org_flow = '${orgFlow}'
and ppr.recipe_Status_Id = '${recipeStatusId}'
order by ppr.SEND_DATE,ppr.CREATE_TIME
